skillTree.localised_description: This obsession with murder is just cheap, mindless bloodlust of the basest kind. To the servants of Slaanesh, there's so much more to life… and to death too, of course.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Khornate factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Khornate factions

skillTree.localised_description: Powerful Slaaneshi servants are often drawn to the Elves' poise and nobility, ripe for corruption. But Dechala's irrational mixture of hatred and fascination for them is *especially* volatile.

effects.description: Melee attack: +14 when fighting against Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Elves
Bonus vs Infantry: +20 when fighting against Elves

skillTree.localised_description: This one’s writhing form can slowly caress and tease, but also move like lightning when required, knocking a projectile from the air or batting it back at the foe.

skillTree.localised_description: Swatting away hurtling missiles is what Slaaneshi grace is particularly well-suited to. Even more so for those endowed with more than the usual single pair of hands.

skillTree.localised_description: The Dark Prince's form-altering gifts can sometimes crush the vanity of His aspirants, ironically dooming them to failure. Few take as much pride in them as Dechala and her champions.

skillTree.localised_description: The Dark Prince's servants are eternally bound to His whims. Those same whims, at times, dictate that He simply... set them loose. So it is with his favoured servant, Dechala.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10%

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

skillTree.localised_description: Dechala spins effortlessly amidst her poisoned, stumbling foes, weapons dropping from their nerveless fingers, hearts giving out in sheer despair.

skillTree.localised_description: Whether sinuously squeezing the life out of her thralls or rushing gleefully into the fray, Dechala revels in her feats of pain and misery.

skillTree.localised_description: Swift flashes of an agile form and razor-sharp blades are all this Daemon Lord's victims see of him, but by then it's already far, far too late.

effects.description: Speed: +12%

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

effects.description: Armour: +7
Armour: +15

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%

skillTree.localised_description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.localised_description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Ability: "Deadly Onslaught"

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
This unit is branded with the Mark of Slaanesh, and is affected by Slaanesh Authority.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit takes no penalties when flanked.

factionEffects.localised_description: To Dechala, the ultimate self-indulgence is freedom from the shackles that bind others to conform. *They* can suffer and they can die, even, as long *her* desires come to pass.
